speech: Hi! I can do nearly anything that involves DnD questions, just ask. I can also answer questions about The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy. I can do some fun tricks. Also, I can provide some tech support towards Android devices, iPhone devices, and Macbook devices. Also, you can now ask about World War 2 and World War 1. Just ask for help, and I will try to provide it!
